summary: THIS IS AN ACCIDENT WAITING O HAPPEN. MY  PANEL BELOW THE REAR WINDOW IN 2002 EXPLORER MAY SOON FLY AND HIT ANOTHER CAR ON THE FREEWAY AND CAUSE A BIG ACCIDENT.
